ComicInfo.Penciller: E.R. Cruz,Ernie Chan,Nick Cardy,Rico Rival,Ernie Chua,E. R. Cruz,Ernie Chua,Rico Rival,E. R. Cruz
ComicInfo.Summary:
To Wake the Dead: Mr. Hobart calls on the ghosts of his ancestors to help stop Mr. Carson from building a skyscraper on the family graveyard.
The Slayer Wore Skirts: A killer is on the loose, stabbing victims on the streets.
Deadmen Do Tell Tales!: Mr. Craig is a reporter trying to interview the reclusive Mr. Belding/Belden.
ComicInfo.Writer: Carl Wessler,George Kashdan,Leo Dorfman,Leo Dorfman,Carl Wessler,George Kashdan
ComicInfo.Title: To Wake the Dead; The Slayer Wore Skirts; Deadmen Do Tell Tales!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Matt,Corrigan,Steven Carson,Aunt Jessie,Cousin Elmo,Uncle Felix,Mr. Hobart
